title: farm_water_reserve_tanks_refill_4000_liters
summary: Refilling connected water reserve tanks totaling 4000 liters for farm water security.
description: Two connected water storage tanks, each with a capacity of 2000 liters, were refilled to ensure continuous water availability for the farm. Water had been previously drawn for garden use on 2026-01-10. Refilling was performed using solar-powered pumping as documented earlier, to prevent water shortages within the farm system.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
